Episodes.Title: Deadly Rig
Episodes.Plot: The Bisso team tries to raise a 750-ton leg of a sunken oil rig from the ocean floor before the wreck topples onto an operational rig just 1,000 feet away and causes a calamity; the inland salvage crew tries to move a 2,000-ton barge.

Episodes.Title: Heavy Metal
Episodes.Plot: Disabled ships and barges flood the harbor of Port Arthur, Texas, in the wake of a wave of destruction; Lunchbox and Pirtle deal with air bags popping in an explosive way; a crew member gets robbed; salvaging a three-story drilling ship.

Episodes.Title: Brink of Disaster
Episodes.Plot: After a tanker collides with an oil barge on the Mississippi River, the Bisso Marine salvage team must pump oil from the wreck before an explosion occurs; the tug gets trapped behind a mooring dock; Lunchbox is in an irritable mood.

Episodes.Title: Hell Unleashed
Episodes.Plot: Joe V is summoned to the Gulf to take on an oil rig lying atop an underwater fuel pipeline like a ticking time bomb; decompression sickness puts a diver's life in jeopardy.

Episodes.Title: Cursed Treasure
Episodes.Plot: Lunchbox and Peter run into nothing but bad luck during a routine beached tugboat job; Pirtle and Dave T must clear a drunken dry dock from the middle of a harbor.

Episodes.Title: Final Battle
Episodes.Plot: Dave and the dive team struggle with one of the worst industrial accidents in the Mississippi's history as they try to lift a broken barge out of the river.
